description: Research compendium of Frerebeau, N., Ben Amara, A. and Cantin, N. (2020) [in french]. The compendium contains all data, code, and text associated with this paper.
notes: This study received a state financial support managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (France) through the program "Investissements d'avenir" (ref. ANR-10-LABX-52).
title: Compendium of R code and data for 'Alterations of ceramic materials: compositional data analysis of an Iberian workshop (Teruel, Spain; 2nd-1st c. BC)'
